speech: Placements of igdtuw are really good. You can visit to this link for detailed information.( http://www.igdtuw.ac.in/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=536&Itemid=824 )

The University T&P Cell facilitates multiple job offers to the eligible students of IGDTUW year after year. You can visit to this link for detailed information.( http://www.igdtuw.ac.in/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=536&Itemid=824 )

Most of the top companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Intuit, Adobe, Expedia visit the campus. You can visit to this link for detailed information.( http://www.igdtuw.ac.in/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=536&Itemid=824 )

During the recruitment drive around 52 companies visited the campus. To name a few prestigious companies like Microsoft, Adobe, Cisco, SAP Labs, Oracle, Qualcomm, Mahindra & Mahindra, General Motors, Cognizant, Aricent, Tata Consultancy Services, Yamaha Motors, Hindustan Unilever, IBM India visit IGDTUW campus for placements and internships. You can visit to this link for detailed information.( http://www.igdtuw.ac.in/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=536&Itemid=824 )
